Why a Portfolio Blog Still Matters in 2025

August 27, 2025

A blog isn’t just for SEO robots. It helps your clients trust you because they can see how you think.

3 fast wins:

  1. Post 1× per week: a 150–300 word tip you learned.
  2. End with a CTA: “Want help? Book a free consult.”
  3. Repost the snippet to IG/LinkedIn with a link back.
